summary: Quick stand-up: team members introduced themselves and checked for sprint updates/blockers. PM asked what to focus on, the Architect requested updates/blockers, the Developer offered help with code, and QA asked to be tagged when items are ready for testing.

actions.task: Tag QA (Jordan) or send 'Ready for testing!' when a feature/task is ready for testing
Assist with development and code tasks as needed
Provide current sprint updates and report any blockers to the Architect (Mike) and PM (Sarah)
